SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON;
-- Insert 80 subscriptions (mix of active, paused, cancelled) -- Using dynamic approach: get first CUSTOMER and first product for each account INSERT INTO subscription (id, account_id, customer_id, product_id, start_date, interval, custom_interval_days, next_delivery, status, quantity, total_deliveries_count, created_at, updated_at) SELECT TOP 80 NEWID(), c.account_id, c.id, (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM product WHERE account_id = c.account_id AND active = 1 ORDER BY NEWID()), DATEADD(day, -ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 30), CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)), CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 5)) WHEN 0 THEN 'daily' WHEN 1 THEN 'weekly' WHEN 2 THEN 'biweekly' WHEN 3 THEN 'monthly' ELSE 'quarterly' END, NULL, DATEADD(day, ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 30), CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)), CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 10)) WHEN 0 THEN 'paused' WHEN 1 THEN 'cancelled' ELSE 'active' END, 1 + ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 3), 0, GETUTCDATE(), GETUTCDATE() FROM customer c WHERE c.customer_type = 'CUSTOMER' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM product p WHERE p.account_id = c.account_id AND p.active = 1);

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON; -- Insert 40 subscription exceptions (skip and reschedule) INSERT INTO subscription_exception (id, subscription_id, exception_date, action, new_date, reason, created_at, updated_at) SELECT TOP 40 NEWID(), sub.id, sub.exception_date, sub.action, sub.new_date, sub.reason, GETUTCDATE(), GETUTCDATE() FROM ( SELECT s.id, DATEADD(day, ABS(CHECKSUM(s.id) % 60), CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) as exception_date, CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(s.id) % 2)) WHEN 0 THEN 'skip' ELSE 'reschedule' END as action, CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(s.id) % 2)) WHEN 0 THEN NULL ELSE DATEADD(day, ABS(CHECKSUM(s.id) % 7) + 1, DATEADD(day, ABS(CHECKSUM(s.id) % 60), CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))) END as new_date, CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(s.id) % 2)) WHEN 0 THEN 'Feriado' ELSE 'Reagendamento solicitado' END as reason FROM subscription s WHERE s.status = 'active' ) sub WHERE (sub.action = 'skip' AND sub.new_date IS NULL) OR (sub.action = 'reschedule' AND sub.new_date IS NOT NULL);

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON;
-- Insert 100 orders (some with subscription_id, some without) INSERT INTO [order] (id, account_id, subscription_id, customer_snapshot, items, delivery_date, status, amount_cents, payment_method, payment_status, paid_amount_cents, delivered_by, delivered_at, paid_at, created_at, updated_at) SELECT TOP 100 NEWID(), COALESCE(s.account_id, c.account_id), s.id, '{"name":"' + c.name + '","email":"' + c.email + '","phone":"' + c.phone + '","address":"' + c.address + '"}', '[{"productId":"' + CAST(p.id AS VARCHAR(36)) + '","productName":"' + p.name + '","quantity":1,"priceCents":' + CAST(p.price_cents AS VARCHAR) + '}]', CASE WHEN s.id IS NULL THEN DATEADD(day, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.id, p.id) % 120, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) ELSE DATEADD(day, ABS(CHECKSUM(s.id) % 60), CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) END, CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 9)) WHEN 0 THEN 'pending' WHEN 1 THEN 'notified' WHEN 2 THEN 'confirmed' WHEN 3 THEN 'delivered' WHEN 4 THEN 'failed' WHEN 5 THEN 'not_delivered_customer_absent' WHEN 6 THEN 'not_delivered_address_issue' WHEN 7 THEN 'not_delivered_refused' ELSE 'cancelled_by_customer' END, p.price_cents, CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 3)) WHEN 0 THEN 'cash' WHEN 1 THEN 'pix' ELSE 'pending' END, CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 3)) WHEN 0 THEN 'paid' WHEN 1 THEN 'partial' ELSE 'unpaid' END, CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 3)) WHEN 0 THEN p.price_cents WHEN 1 THEN p.price_cents / 2 ELSE 0 END, CASE WHEN ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 2) = 0 THEN (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM [user] WHERE account_id = COALESCE(s.account_id, c.account_id) AND role = 'deliverer') ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 2) = 0 THEN GETUTCDATE() ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 2) = 0 THEN GETUTCDATE() ELSE NULL END, GETUTCDATE(), GETUTCDATE() FROM customer c CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM product WHERE account_id = c.account_id AND active = 1 ORDER BY NEWID()) p LEFT JOIN subscription s ON s.customer_id = c.id AND s.status = 'active' WHERE c.customer_type = 'CUSTOMER';

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON; -- Insert 80 reminders (mix of orders, subscriptions, customers) INSERT INTO reminder (id, account_id, target, target_id, method, send_at, template_id, status, payload, sent_at, error_message, created_at, updated_at) SELECT TOP 80 NEWID(), o.account_id, 'order', o.id, CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 3)) WHEN 0 THEN 'whatsapp' WHEN 1 THEN 'sms' ELSE 'email' END, DATEADD(hour, ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 24), DATEADD(day, -ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 7), GETUTCDATE())), (SELECT TOP 1 id FROM template WHERE account_id = o.account_id AND type = 'order_reminder'), CASE (ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 4)) WHEN 0 THEN 'scheduled' WHEN 1 THEN 'sent' WHEN 2 THEN 'failed' ELSE 'cancelled' END, '{"orderId":"' + CAST(o.id AS VARCHAR(36)) + '"}', CASE WHEN ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 2) = 0 THEN GETUTCDATE() ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 10) = 0 THEN 'Erro ao enviar' ELSE NULL END, GETUTCDATE(), GETUTCDATE() FROM [order] o WHERE o.account_id IN (SELECT id FROM account WHERE company_name LIKE '%Padaria%' OR company_name LIKE '%Mercado%' OR company_name LIKE '%Farmácia%' OR company_name LIKE '%Açougue%' OR company_name LIKE '%Hortifruti%');

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON; -- Insert 80 promotion_products (relating promotions with specific products) INSERT INTO promotion_product (promotion_id, product_id) SELECT TOP 80 p.id, pr.id FROM promotion p CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM product WHERE account_id = p.account_id AND active = 1 ORDER BY NEWID()) pr WHERE p.active = 1;

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON; -- Insert 30 promotion_combos (relating with combo-type promotions) INSERT INTO promotion_combo (id, promotion_id, combo_name, combo_price_cents, created_at, updated_at) SELECT TOP 30 NEWID(), p.id, 'Combo ' + p.name, ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 10000) + 5000, GETUTCDATE(), GETUTCDATE() FROM promotion p WHERE p.active = 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM promotion_combo WHERE promotion_id = p.id);

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON; -- Insert 100 promotion_combo_items (relating combos with products) INSERT INTO promotion_combo_item (combo_id, product_id, quantity) SELECT TOP 100 pc.id, pr.id, 1 + ABS(CHECKSUM(NEWID()) % 3) FROM promotion_combo pc CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM product WHERE account_id = (SELECT account_id FROM promotion WHERE id = pc.promotion_id) AND active = 1 ORDER BY NEWID()) pr;

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON; -- Insert 60 carts (some with customer_id, some with session_id only) -- Note: session_id must be unique, so we generate a unique value for each cart INSERT INTO cart (id, customer_id, account_id, session_id, promotion_code, discount_amount_cents, total_amount_cents, created_at, updated_at) SELECT TOP 60 cart_id, customer_id, account_id, 'session_' + CAST(cart_id AS VARCHAR(36)) as session_id, promotion_code, discount_amount_cents, total_amount_cents, GETUTCDATE(), GETUTCDATE() FROM ( SELECT NEWID() as cart_id, CASE WHEN ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 2) = 0 THEN c.id ELSE NULL END as customer_id, c.account_id, CASE WHEN ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 3) = 0 THEN (SELECT TOP 1 code FROM promotion WHERE account_id = c.account_id AND active = 1) ELSE NULL END as promotion_code, CASE WHEN ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 3) = 0 THEN ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 1000) ELSE 0 END as discount_amount_cents, ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 50000) + 1000 as total_amount_cents FROM customer c WHERE c.customer_type = 'CUSTOMER' ) sub;

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON; -- Insert 150 cart_items (2-5 items per cart) INSERT INTO cart_item (id, cart_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price_cents, subtotal_cents, created_at, updated_at) SELECT TOP 150 NEWID(), c.id, p.id, 1 + ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 5), ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 5000) + 500, (1 + ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 5)) * (ABS(CHECKSUM(c.id) % 5000) + 500), GETUTCDATE(), GETUTCDATE() FROM cart c CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM product WHERE account_id = c.account_id AND active = 1 ORDER BY NEWID()) p WHERE c.account_id IN (SELECT id FROM account WHERE company_name LIKE '%Padaria%' OR company_name LIKE '%Mercado%' OR company_name LIKE '%Farmácia%' OR company_name LIKE '%Açougue%' OR company_name LIKE '%Hortifruti%') AND p.id IS NOT NULL;
